page.title: 14TOURISM
page.content: People come to holiday cottages in this area from all over the country. Some people come to stay with relatives.People are usually allowed to bring pets.The cottages are booked from May to September,and the people stay for one or two weeks at a time. There are a few bed and breakfast places where people stay over night. All the cottages are fully furnished and self catering. Fees for renting cottages vary from Â£50 to Â£150 per week depending on the size of the cottage and the time of year. Orton Hall has eight flats. There are two rooms for four people and six rooms for two people.Rooms for two people have a lounge,bedroom,kitchen and a bathroom.Others have two bedrooms.Afternoon teas are also served at Orton Hall to casual visitors.
